title: Science Inquiry Simulation Education in Online Remote Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and comprehension of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Learners participate in online learning via computer-mediated communication across diverse physical settings (home/training institutions) and utilize VR-based science experiment simulations

learning_goals: Learners can independently design procedures for at least three science experiments using VR-based simulations.
Learners can analyze experimental results based on real-time communication with peers via online collaboration tools.
Learners can establish effective remote learning strategies considering physical conditions of the learning environment (e.g., lighting, spatial arrangement).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
